titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Alida Ann Rigel history

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

archdesc.bioghist: Historian of the Mason County, Michigan, Historical Club.
archdesc.scopecontent: Volume containing typescript of articles originally from the Ludington, Michigan, newspaper, and relating to the history of Mason County, Michigan, its townships, pioneer settlers, and notable events.
